title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.5 - Subject-matter list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 340.5 - Subject-matter list

State Regulations
(a) A subject-matter list shall be available for public inspection and copying. The
list shall be sufficiently detailed to permit the requester to identify the
file category of the records sought. (b) The subject-matter list shall be revised
and updated not less than semi-annually and the date of the most recent
revision shall appear on the first page. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
340.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
